EmailTemplate.description: Review Cycle Has Been Terminated, Email for Primary Reviewers of Original Distribution List
EmailTemplate.name: Review cycle Terminate - Primary
EmailTemplate.subject: IMPORTANT: The current FPR cycle of FPR {!Publication__c.Name} has been Terminated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Do not reply to this email message.
The current FPR cycle of FPR {!Publication__c.Name} been terminated. No further action is required for this FPR record. Contact the FPR coordinator, {!Publication__c.Assigned_FPRC__c}, if you have questions or need support.
Thank you, FPR System
